titles.en: Chapter 34 – The mistake during the commencement of the Salāt
Chapter 35 – The mistake during the recitation
Chapter 33 – The one whose ablution breaks before Salām (the greeting at the end of Salāt)
Chapter 34 – The mistake during the commencement of the Salāt

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: حسن كالصحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (15/184)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ بْنِ هَاشِمٍ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ جَمِيلٍ وَ مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنِ الْفَضْلِ بْنِ شَاذَانَ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ جَمِيلِ بْنِ دَرَّاجٍ عَنْ زُرَارَةَ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الرَّجُلِ يَنْسَى تَكْبِيرَةَ الِافْتِتَاحِ قَالَ يُعِيدُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim Bin Hashim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Jameel, and Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Al Fazl Bin Shazaan, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Jameel Bin Darraj, from Zurara who said,
‘I asked Abu Ja’farasws about the man who forgets the exclamation of Takbīr in the beginning. Heasws said: ‘He should repeat’.
en.sarwar: 1. Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Umayr from Jamil and Muhammad ibn ’Isma‘il from al-Fadl ibn Shadhan from ibn abu ‘Umayr from Jamil ibn Darraj from Zurarah who has said the following: “I once asked abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about one who forgets the opening Takbir (Allah is great beyond description). He (the Imam) said, ‘He says it again.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: موثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (15/184)

parts.text: الْفَضْلِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْمَلِكِ أَوِ ابْنِ أَبِي يَعْفُورٍ
أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّهُ

narrator_chain.text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ عَامِرٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ مَهْزِيَارَ عَنْ فَضَالَةَ عَنْ أَبَانٍ عَنِ الْفَضْلِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْمَلِكِ أَوِ ابْنِ أَبِي يَعْفُورٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّهُ قَالَ

text: فِي الرَّجُلِ يُصَلِّي فَلَمْ يَفْتَتِحْ بِالتَّكْبِيرِ هَلْ تُجْزِئُهُ تَكْبِيرَةُ الرُّكُوعِ قَالَ لَا بَلْ يُعِيدُ صَلَاتَهُ إِذَا حَفِظَ أَنَّهُ لَمْ يُكَبِّرْ .

en.hubeali: Al Husayn Bin Muhammad Al Ashary, from Abdullah Bin Aamir, from Ali Bin Mahziyar, from Fazalat, from Aban, from Al Fazl Bin Abdul Malik, or Ibn Abu Yafour,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said regarding the man who prays a Salāt but did not open it with the exclamation of Takbīr, would the exclamation of Takbīr of the Rukū suffice him?’ Heasws said: ‘No, but he should repeat his Salāt when he remembers that he did not exclaim Takbīr’.
en.sarwar: 2. Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad al-Ash’ariy has narrated from ‘Abd Allah ibn ‘Amir from Ali ibn Mahziyar from Fadalah from Aban from al-Fadl ibn ‘Abd al-Malik or ibn abu Ya‘fur who has said the following: “About a man who performs Salah (prayer) but forgets to say the opening Takbir (Allah is great beyond description) if Takbir (Allah is great beyond description) for Ruku‘ (bowing down on one’s knees) is sufficient. Abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘It is not sufficient. He performs Salah (prayer) again when he finds out that he has not said the Takbir (Allah is great beyond description).”’

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى رَفَعَهُ عَنِ الرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: الْإِمَامُ يَحْمِلُ أَوْهَامَ مَنْ خَلْفَهُ إِلَّا تَكْبِيرَةَ الِافْتِتَاحِ .

en.hubeali: (It has been narrated) raising it from Al-Rezaasws having said: ‘The prayer leader would bear the imaginations of the ones behind him except for the opening Takbīr’.
en.sarwar: 3. Muhammad ibn Yahya in a marfu‘ manner has narrated from the following: “Al-Rida, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘An Imam carries and sustains the conjectures of those who are behind him except the opening Takbir (Allah is great beyond description).”’
